name: Hair Alchemy Strengthening Travel Set
about: What it is:A travel-size set that includes the Hair Alchemy Strengthening Shampoo, Conditioner, and Treatment Serum..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends and Breakage.Key Benefits:- Strengthens and reinforces fragile hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Curative Blend (Chia Seed, Bio-Fermented Bamboo Leaf, and Plant-Based Protein): Strengthens strands, as well as prevents breakage caused by brushing, styling, and external aggressors..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:The Resilience Shampoo and Conditioner strengthen fragile strands from the inside out, while delivering a surge of moisture to replenish elasticity. The Fortifying Treatment Serum shields and reinforces fragile hair, preventing breakage and encouraging length..Fragrance Description:Created in collaboration with one of the oldest French Fragrance houses, Oribeu2019s signature scent, Cu00f4te du2019Azur, features sun-drenched notes of Calabrian bergamot, white butterfly jasmine, and sandalwoodu2014embodying the glamour and heat of the legendary destination...Clinical Results:Based on a clinical test of Hair Alchemy Shampoo, Conditioner, and Fortifying Treatment, when used as a system vs. non-conditioning:.This Set Contains:- 2.5 oz/ 75 mL Hair Alchemy Strengthening Shampoo
ingredients: -Curative Blend (Chia Seed, Bio-Fermented Bamboo Leaf, and Plant-Based Protein): Strengthens strands, as well as prevents breakage caused by brushing, styling, and external aggressors..-Multi-Action Hyaluronic Acid Complex: Hydrates from within to deliver a surge of moisture and increase elasticity..-Daisy and Honeysuckle Extracts: Help to strengthen hair from the root while fortifying brittle ends, improving overall hair health, and encouraging length...Hair Alchemy Strengthening Shampoo: .Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply Shampoo to wet hair as the first step in your cleansing routine..-Lather, indulge, and rinse..-Follow with Hair Alchemy Conditioner to reveal hairu2018s supernatural strength..-Massage, indulge for at least one minute, and rinse..-Follow with Hair Alchemy Fortifying Treatment Serum to further nourish strands post-shower..-Work a dime-size amount of product into damp or dry hair to strengthen..-More product can be added for thicker textures or longer lengths..-Layer with other products as needed and style as usual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While product is overpriced am very pleased with the results, definitely worth the try and will be purchasing larger sizes. A little goes a long way, will get 8-10 washes maybe more out of these small bottles. Smell is not my favorite but isnu2019t terrible  favoritefavorite

reviews.review_title: Not what I was expecting for the luxury line Oribe
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Are you kidding us! This was a big waste of $$ & for the price of these little bottles is a joke. The shampoo & conditioner did absolutely nothing for my dried, frizzy, limp hair & I love Oribe products & there's only enough conditioner for 2-3 washes for longer hair & the shampoo about 5-6 washes. I was really disappointed in this luxury hair product & in my eyes there's nothing luxurious about this line. Please fix the issues as it's not right for your customers. Thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dont waste your money; there is nothing u201cluxuryu201d about this shampoo. I barely notice any difference in my hair.

reviews.review_title: Alchemy is a nice oribe formula, repurchased
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using these alchemy oribe products for the past four months, particularly the leave in serum treatment as a heat protector. I bought the holiday packaged travel set first and then repurchased full size because I liked how it felt on my thinning, aging, straight hair. Not too stripping nor too emollient. I do not understand these negative reviews that are complaining about the price or the size which are both clearly stated when you make the purchase or claiming that their hair is falling out. Hair falls out every day particularly noticeably when youu2019re washing your hair. I have not experienced, this and my hair has never looked better. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money at all. Purchased this for a trip and the products didnu2019t help at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay the product was really good, I repurchased the full sizes, but this set is damnnnn expensive. The products are much smaller than I expected. I understand the line is premium, I just wish I got more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazingu2026. Transformed my fine, color treated hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I go to a salon where they have oribe products and I've always been told how great oribe is for your hair, so when I saw this set I had to try it .. well I have thick wavy hair and this makes my hair feel dry , fall out and gross and brittle never have I had products do this.. and it has a weird chemically smell don't recommend I'm very disappointed especially for the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this so bad! I have fine and thinning hair and this was recommended to give hair strength and help with growth. Lost hair, felt heavy and dirty even after washing.

reviews.review_title: So much hair fallout after 1 use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It smells good, but it made my hair feel so brittle, and yet so heavy at the same time. I have thick, wavy, long hair, and so much of it fell out after just one use.
